content: Feedback on the SEOmoz Blog: What Can We Do For You? Moz News By: Rand Fishkin April 8, 2010 The author's views are entirely their own (excluding the unlikely event of hypnosis) and may not always reflect the views of Moz. Table of Contents Copied! By: Rand Fishkin April 8, 2010 Feedback on the SEOmoz Blog: What Can We Do For You? Moz News The author's views are entirely their own (excluding the unlikely event of hypnosis) and may not always reflect the views of Moz. I'm feeling a bit guilty. Over the past 10 weeks, I've been on the road almost constantly, and possibly neglecting the blog a bit more than usual. To atone, I'm hoping to gather some feedback from you - our readers and members - about what you'd like to see more/less of in the weeks and months to come. While we've certainly been inspired by our traffic and readership growth this year... In 2009, we averaged ~14K visits/day. 2010 is nearly 20K/day (note: weekdays are typically higher while weekends are much lower) We don't want to rest on our laurels or stop pushing ourselves to get better. Thus, if you have 5 minutes to fill out the following embedded survey, we'd really appreciate it! You can also access it here via Google Docs. Loading... Thanks so much for your feedback - and please feel free to be more detailed and make specific requests in the comments. We want to make our topics the content that serves you best and with your help, we're excited to do ever better than before. Copied! Back to Top
